message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $11,000?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $11,000 is a good offer, I'm looking to get closer to $12,000 for this product. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $11,500?

I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $11,000. How about we meet at $11,250? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider this offer?
